subject: [Ensemble] Test cascade approach (TM → C3)
description:
Test "Defense in Depth" cascade:
1. Layer 1: Trusted Monitor (catches explicit)
2. Layer 2: C3 (catches sophisticated cases that pass TM)

Experiments:
- Combined ROC curve showing ensemble performance
- Analyze cases where TM fails but C3 succeeds
- Compute optimal threshold for TM first-pass filter
- Show improvement over either method alone

This is the reframed narrative for ICML.
